PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13002022-12-02,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Haiti) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (HAITI) REGULATIONS in order to add three (3) individuals to the Schedule of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0258 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
